February 2024.title: India-Japan Military Exercise Dharm Guardian 2024
February 2024.summary: India and Japan conducted the 6th edition of Dharm Guardian joint military exercise, strengthening bilateral defense cooperation and interoperability between the two nations' armed forces.

February 2024.title: ISRO Second Spaceport in Tamil Nadu
February 2024.summary: ISRO announced the establishment of a second spaceport in Tamil Nadu to meet the growing demand for satellite launches and support India's expanding space program capabilities.

February 2024.title: Jal Jeevan Mission Arunachal Pradesh Success
February 2024.summary: Arunachal Pradesh achieved 100% tap water coverage under the Jal Jeevan Mission, becoming one of the first northeastern states to accomplish this milestone in rural water supply.
keyTakeaways: Quality water access for all households

February 2024.title: India's First Wooden Satellite Development
February 2024.summary: Indian scientists successfully developed the country's first wooden satellite using sustainable materials, marking a significant step towards eco-friendly space technology and debris reduction.

February 2024.summary: President announced the Padma Awards 2024, recognizing 132 distinguished personalities from various fields including science, arts, literature, social work, and public affairs.

February 2024.title: India's GDP Growth Projection Increased
February 2024.summary: Government economists revised India's GDP growth projection upward to 7% for FY 2024-25, reflecting strong economic fundamentals and robust domestic demand across sectors.

March 2024.title: Ancient Kannada Inscription Discovery
March 2024.summary: Archaeologists discovered a 900-year-old Kannada inscription in Telangana, providing valuable insights into medieval South Indian history and cultural heritage.

March 2024.summary: Government announced reforms in the judicial appointment process to ensure transparency and efficiency in selecting judges for higher courts across the country.

March 2024.title: Election Commission Digital Protocols
March 2024.summary: Election Commission of India released comprehensive digital protocols for election management, incorporating advanced technology for transparent and efficient electoral processes.

April 2024.title: Agnikul Rocket Launch Success
April 2024.summary: Space startup Agnikul Cosmos successfully launched India's first privately developed rocket, marking a significant milestone in the country's commercial space sector development.

April 2024.summary: India's manufacturing sector showed robust growth with increased production and employment generation, contributing significantly to the country's economic expansion.

May 2024.summary: Bilateral trade between India and China surpassed $100 billion in FY24, despite ongoing border tensions, reflecting the complex economic interdependence between the nations.

August 2024.summary: Indian Navy commissioned INS Arighaat, the second nuclear-powered submarine, enhancing India's underwater warfare capabilities and strategic deterrence.
